Hello. I am an inventory bot
Please select one of options
1.Supplies & inventory Check
(Example: details / info for itemid24; info about itemid24; date info of itemid24; location of itemid22; quantity of itemid22)
2.Order Details
(Example: details / info details for order24; order placed for itemid24; order date for itemid24; quantity info for order24)
3.Create PO (PurchaseOrder)
(Example: POCreation: ItemID11,50)
4.Get Sales Order/Purchase Order Details
(Example: details / info for PONum1; date for PONum1; Purchase quantity details for PONum1; Vendor info for PONum1)
